question: You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Be sure to produce executable code whenever possible. Create a simple love confession code for me that can be presented in video format.

checklist.title: Is the love confession video generation implemented correctly?
checklist.description: Review whether the code successfully creates a video output with proper love confession elements. Check if the code includes video creation libraries (e.g., ffmpeg wrappers), animation frameworks, or canvas-to-video conversion. Score 0 if no video output is possible, 5 if basic video is created but with limitations, 10 if a complete video with smooth playback is implemented.

checklist.title: Does the confession include interactive or animated elements?
checklist.description: Evaluate the implementation of animations, transitions, or interactive elements in the confession. Look for CSS animations, JavaScript animations (GSAP, anime.js), or canvas-based animations. Deduct 5 points if animations are jerky or have performance issues, 3 points if timing is poorly synchronized. The full score is 10 points for smooth, thematic animations that enhance the confession.

checklist.title: Is the text content of the confession customizable?
checklist.description: Check if the code allows for personalization of the confession message, names, dates, or other content. Score 10 points if the code includes clear variables or parameters for customization, 5 points if limited customization is possible but requires code editing, 0 points if all content is hardcoded without any customization options.

checklist.title: Does the code include audio or sound integration?
checklist.description: Assess whether background music, sound effects, or voice narration capabilities are implemented. Check for proper audio format support, volume control, and synchronization with visual elements. Deduct 5 points if audio implementation is present but not synchronized with visuals, 3 points if audio controls are missing. The full score is 10 points for complete audio implementation with proper timing.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code can handle common abnormal situations (such as media loading failures, browser compatibility issues, mobile responsiveness, etc.) and provide fallbacks or friendly error prompts. Code with strong robustness should handle edge cases effectively, giving 10 points. If the robustness is average, give 5 points, and if no exceptions are handled, give 0 points.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. Interactive elements that respond to user input 2. Particle effects or visual surprises 3. Responsive design that adapts to different viewing contexts). Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Redundant implementation of similar functions (e.g., multiple animation systems coexisting) 2. Function modules unrelated to the confession (e.g., unnecessary game elements) 3. Fancy effects that affect performance (e.g., excessive particle systems). Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core functions are interfered with by redundant code.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review modular design (such as separating content/presentation/interaction layers), code structure, and maintainability. Deduct 5 points if global scope pollution is found or design patterns are not used; deduct 5 points if the code duplication rate is too high (over 30%); deduct 5 points if there's no clear organization or commenting. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the interface vision meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the overall design follows modern design principles: 1) Harmonious color matching (romantic theme with complementary colors) 2) Proper layout spacing and composition 3) Professional typography (readable fonts, proper sizing and contrast). Deduct 3 points for each visual design flaw, 5 points for clashing colors or illegible text, and 5 points for chaotic layout. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the emotional impact effective and appropriate?
checklist.description: Judge whether the confession creates genuine emotional resonance: 1) Appropriate pacing for emotional buildup 2) Harmonious integration of visuals, text, and potentially audio 3) Tasteful presentation without being clich√©. Deduct 5 points for an overly generic approach, 3 points for mismatched tone or mood, and 5 points for elements that detract from the sincere message. The full score is 10 points.
